Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.tasks

Class AbstractTaskList

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.tasks.AbstractTaskList
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActiveTaskList, TaskList
    public abstract class AbstractTaskList
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class AbstractTaskList that all other TaskLists inherit from. Provides the basis for TaskList and ActiveTaskList
    Author:
    Mason Morano, Inyene Etuk

      • completeTask

        public void completeTask​(Task t)
        Sets the flag of a task to Completed. Iterates over the list of Tasks to find a task, then remove it and increment completed counter
        Parameters:
        t - the Task to set as Complete

      • getTasksAsArray
